data.name: The Collector's Legends
data.detailed_description:
Start as a young adventurer with nothing but big dreams, crawl into creepy dungeons, slay hoards of monsters and foes, gain experience, accumulate wealth so that you can crawl into even creepier spaces, slay even more monsters until you finally reach insanity or you... become... Legend.

In The Collector's Legends, you begin your adventure with a basic deck of cards in a world full of danger but also opportunity. As you navigate through the world, you will find missions and maps, each will lead you to a multi-zone battle. In each zone, you will kill enemies, take their loot, and then proceed to the next zone.

Killing enemies will grant you experience, which will allow you to level up your character. Whenever your character gains a level, you will receive a talent point which you can use to allocate a node in the character's intricate Talent Tree, with each node improving your character in some way.

Loot will be randomly generated and its value and quantity will be based on the difficulty of the zone. It will include currency, crafting materials, and also special items that can be left in your inventory for bonuses, passive effects, or other modifiers influencing gameplay. Consumable currency items will allow you to modify items, including cards, similarly to how Path of Exile's currency system works.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: A deck-building RPG roguelite with lots of loot, deep interactive mechanics, and extensive character and card customizations.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: dual core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: dedicated

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: dual core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: quad core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: dedicated
